mapper.select: select insuranceName, name, age, email, accidentHistory from fireInsuranceRegistrationInfo where statement = #{searchMethod} union all + select insuranceName, name, age, email, accidentHistory from onTheSeaInsuranceRegistrationInfo where statement = #{searchMethod} union all + select insuranceName, name, age, email, accidentHistory from carInsuranceRegistrationInfo where statement = #{searchMethod} union all + select insuranceName, name, age, email, accidentHistory from specialInsuranceRegistrationInfo where statement = #{searchMethod};
mapper.delete: delete from insurance where insuranceName = #{information} + and statement = 0;
mapper.update: update insurance SET statement = 1 where insuranceName = #{information};
